quotes: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quotes: Your ability to discipline yourself to set clear goals and then to work toward them every day will do more to guarantee your success than any other single factor.
author: Brian Tracy

quotes: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quotes: Success is not final. Failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quotes: Some people dream of success while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes: As long as you are learning you are not failing.
author: Bob Ross

quotes: Life will only change when you become more committed to your dreams than you are to your comfort zone.
author: Billy Cox

quotes: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quotes: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes: “If you want something you never had, you have to do something you’ve never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quotes: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quotes: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quotes: Why should you continue going after your dreams? Because seeing the look on the faces of the people who said you couldn’t… will be priceless.
author: Kevin Ngo

quotes: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

quotes: A ship is always safe ashore but that is not what it’s built for.
author: Albert Einstein

quotes: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
author: Ray Goforth

quotes: Failure is success in progress.
author: Albert Einstein

quotes: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quotes: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill

quotes: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quotes: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quotes: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quotes: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quotes: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.
author: Bill Gates

quotes: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
author: Robert Collier

quotes: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quotes: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes: Life is not fair — get used to it!
author: Bill Gates

quotes: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes: To win big, you sometimes have to take big risks.
author: Bill Gates

quotes: In a world that's changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes: The more you seek the uncomfortable the more you will become comfortable.
author: Conor Mcgregor

quotes: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quotes: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quotes: Success only comes to those who dare to attempt.
author: Mallika Tripathi

quotes: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quotes: Dedication sees dreams come true.
author: Kobe Bryant

quotes: If you've got the confidence and the work ethic, you can make any dream come true.
author: Bret Hart

quotes: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win
author: Kobe Bryant

quotes: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them.
author: Ben Hogan

quotes: Choices and decisions must be supported by your passion, resolve, and a productive work ethic. If these meet opportunity, your success has finally come!
author: Archibald Marwizi

quotes: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
author: Napoleon Hill

quotes: If there is no struggle, there is no progress
author: Frederick Douglass

quotes: Progress takes time and discipline.
author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes: To become a champion requires a good mental attitude toward preparation. You must accept the most tedious tasks with pleasure.
author: Bruce Lee

quotes: Sometimes the outcome isn't always what you desire it to be, but the true failure in life is not trying at all.
author: CM Punk

quotes: Don’t fear failure. In great attempts, it is glorious even to fail.
author: Bruce Lee

quotes: Long-term consistency trumps short-term intensity.
author: Bruce Lee

quotes: Ships don’t sink because of the water around them, ships sink because of the water that gets in them. Don’t let what’s happening around you get inside you and weigh you down.
author: Unknown
